methods: abstract void onScrollStateChange(NumberPicker view, int scrollState) Callback invoked while the number picker scroll state has changed.
constants: int SCROLL_STATE_FLING The user had previously been scrolling using touch and performed a fling.
int SCROLL_STATE_IDLE The view is not scrolling.
int SCROLL_STATE_TOUCH_SCROLL The user is scrolling using touch, and his finger is still on the screen.
